snippet.title: ARBO: Arena Tactics—Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2914810/ARBO_Arena_Tactics/
Get your Playtest key: https://community.arbo.xyz/
Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/ARBO

ARBO ALPHA PLAYTEST: Feb 17th
Join our community Hub at the link above to claim your key, available first come first serve on Feb 17!

*ARBO: Arena Tactics* is built for those who love deep strategy, tactical decision-making, and the thrill of competition. We've been working tirelessly to ensure every aspect of the game brings something new to the genre, and we can't wait for you to experience it.

In the game, you will command squads of intergalactic fighters in fast-paced, turn-based combat within an interactive hex-tiled arena. We've blended our favorite strategy games to create this strategy-CCG hybrid, designed to challenge your tactical thinking and reward creative playstyles. We hope you will enjoy theorycrafting and engaging in epic battles of wits with your opponents.

If you're a strategy game lover, we invite you to join our Discord community. Be part of the conversation, share your thoughts, and help us refine the game as we prepare for launch. Follow ongoing developments and meet other like-minded friends who share your passion for strategy games.

See you in the arena!

#gaming #strategygames #indiegame #turnbased #videogames
